house_listing.house_description: Old world charm abundant in this spacious traditional home in larchmont! 4 bedrooms, 3 full baths, large formal living & dining rooms, large den w/gas fireplace, remodeled eat-in kichen w/white cabinets & beautiful hardwood floor, all appliances, detached garage, enclosed sun porch & lots more!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Sun Room,Utility Room
